section.title: About Me
section.content: I am Web Developer with a experience for developing modern and scalable Web Applications that can contribute to the efficiency and effectiveness of organization success. I have strong background in Web Development and Computer Programming. You can download my CV for more information.

section.title: Backend Development
section.content: I have experience in backend development using Django as framework for developing complex Web Apps and Flask or FastAPI for developing Microservices and API.

section.title: Frontend Development
section.content: I have experience in frontend development using React or Vue as frontend framework for developing SPA and Dynamic UI. I used Tailwind CSS or Bootstrap for designing the User Interface.

section.title: Database Management
section.content: I have experience in creating and manipulating data in a PostgreSQL Relational Database and MongoDB NoSQL Database and connect them in the Backend Technology.

section.title: Programming Technologies
section.content: I have experience in different programming languages like Python for Backend Development, Automation and Scripting. I also have experience in JavaScript for Fullstack Development and Java or C# for developing Desktop Application.

experience.title: Desktop Application Developer
experience.description: Developing a booking and check-in system for ADC Hotel and Resort to manage guests data and reservation as a capstone project.

experience.title: Network Administrator Assistant
experience.description: Assisting a Network Administrator in managing and maintaining the college's network infrastructure, troubleshooting computer issues and cleaning a computer labs as a OJT student.

projects.title: Moviary
projects.description: A Web Application that you can search movies, browse pupular movies and see the trending movies.

projects.title: Timeny
projects.description: Know your remaining life according to average life expectancy of human and discover more info about your birthday.

projects.title: Green Jobs
projects.description: Browse or post an environmental jobs that you can work, fulltime or partime to contribute to save the mother earth.

projects.title: IP Info
projects.description: A web application that provides information about your IP address, including geolocation.
